trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_SEQ_00<tab>Weidheri is in need of a helping hand.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_TODO_00<tab>Deliver bottles of arak to the soldiers of Ala Ghiri.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Weidheri.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_000<tab>Oi, adventurer. If you're planning to linger a while, would you mind making a small delivery for me?

TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_001<tab>I thought I'd give the soldiers a sample of my wares, as a show of appreciation for taking back Ala Ghiri. With all these customers, though, I'm too busy by half.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_002<tab>Would you mind passing around a few bottles of this here spirits? I'm sure they've worked up quite a thirst.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_003<tab>After all they've done for us, a few bottles of spirits is the least I can offer to thank them.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_SOLDIERA02830_000_010<tab>Is there something I can help you with, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_SOLDIERA02830_000_011<tab>A bottle of spirits? Why, how generous of them. With my shift ending soon, this is just what I needed to relax.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_SOLDIERB02830_000_012<tab>Yes? What is it?
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_SOLDIERB02830_000_013<tab>Oh my, a bottle of Gyr Abanian spirits. I take it the people here are in a celebrating mood? Hmmm... I think I'll go and have a drink right now.

TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_HEWELIN_000_014<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Gods, am I thirsty...)) ((Why is it so insufferably hot today...)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Why is it so insufferably hot today...)) ((Gods, am I thirsty...)) /var>)) /var>
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_HEWELIN_000_015<tab>A bottle of spirits to celebrate? This couldn't have come at a better time. Thank you.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_HEWELIN_000_016<tab>The Gyr Abanians always were a hospitable lot. Thankfully some things never change.

TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_PALEMORNING_000_017<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var>, adventurer. What can I do for you?
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_PALEMORNING_000_018<tab>That's awfully kind of you. Obviously I can't drink this now, but pass along my thanks all the same.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_PALEMORNING_000_019<tab>It's an awfully tempting gift, but I really should wait until my watch is over.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_020<tab>Thanks for that. Nothing like a bottle of spirits to lift one's spirits, I always say.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_021<tab><sigh> Ala Ghiri's been through so much over the years. It does my heart good to know we can breathe free again.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_022<tab>That's why I decided to give these brave soldiers my very best bottles of arak. It's a special brew made right here in Ala Ghiri.

TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_023<tab>To be honest I'm not sure how I'll replenish my stocks, but it's worth it to see everyone enjoying themselves. We've had enough worrying to last us a lifetime.
TEXT_STMBDZ802_02830_WEIDHERI_000_024<tab>For now I say we drink, and enjoy the taste of victory.
